WRITING.TITLE: [WP] They say you die twice. The second time is when someone says your name for the last time. Your spirit is bound to earth as long as you are remembered.

WRITING.TEXT:
12 years
Wow. You're definitely my senior in terms of piano experience. You should be giving me advice lol. I started quite late compared to others, many of my friends are at 7,8, and one who is at the level-above-10-that-I-can't-remember... I hope as I get busier I will still find the time to practice.

When you first start 30 mins is all you need, consider moving on to 45 min or an hour only when you're fairly good (think lvl 6+). Will save you a fair bit of money. I found that [hanon exercises](http://javanese.imslp.info/files/imglnks/usimg/1/1b/IMSLP91547-PMLP03129-Hanon_Final.pdf) are really helpful, play for 10 mins or so for warm up helps build up finger strength. [Here](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gsmyZF6gh3E) are [some](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4I_NYya-WWg list=WL index=12) stuff I [like](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Am0PCTQI8iM). You have a looong journey ahead of you, stay true, my friend.
It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
This whole thing is awesome. Laughing my ass off here. Thanks OP
Maybe it comes from our desire to measure others, in some way or form.

I like the world you built! It feels comfortable to read your story, your character's dialogue and movement are very smooth. I think this could easily turn into a multi-part story. Any chance for part 3?

WRITING.TITLE: [WP] A victim is murdered in their sleep. A detective finds the recording of their last dream before they die, hoping for some clues.

WRITING.TEXT: Ah, just saw the moon above Turkey, nice detail. Also, consider making the shadows lighter. Russia seems to have a hood, and I can barely see the bandages on France. Overall great art.
Your shadows are all wonky, America is facing the light, but Brittan who is facing the other way is also light. Where's your light source coming from?

Learn. Stop and think. Sleep. Work out the tangles in my life. Build an igloo. Read. Lie down and look at the sky. Find out what I really want to do. Sleep some more. Talk with family. Go on long walks. Finally finish that painting. Earn money. Jump out of a plane. And survive. Stay up till the wee hours of morning. Listen to the clock tick to midnight.

Middle earth. Minas Tirth and the Shire. Dungeons deep and dragon fire. Oh how I wish to go there.

WRITING.TEXT: Agreed.
Be an executioner! Kill people legally, and never die! I've hacked your system!

Yup, different versions in the same model tree just add more fancy features that you don't really need. I came across an older version of my piano, touch and sound are exactly the same, just not as many buttons. I'll even say if you are looking at a model, maybe consider buying older versions, its usually cheaper. But if you're playing pretty advanced stuff, do consider spending extra bucks and buying a higher end model; the sound really is different, and I think its worth it.
I love this! Its my phone background now.

2) I got mugged and lost $76.
